column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My biggest problem with Common Bond
column3: is its prices. At $9.20 for a pastry and a coffee
column4: I could easily be eating a full meal. The other times I've come in
column5: I've ordered off the lunch menu
column7: but even more pricy. Unless you're planning on staying a while to take advantage of the free refills
column8: adding a drink to your order can more than double the price of your order. Next time I come in
column9: I'll be ordering just pastries - no coffee for me
